title: Permanent ban on this account
body:
I have no idea why this account is permanently banned.

I haven't used this account for about 2 years and all of sudden it has been banned.

replies.body:
Heyo!

I went ahead and took a look into your account.  Due to the nature of the suspension, we can't really talk about it here on Boards >.<  To get more detailed information about the ban and why it exists, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new)!  They'll go much more in-depth with you than I can.

I hope this helps!

I would like to give me the prizes for the end of season 7 because I tried hard to get into the gold, but unfortunately in one game my character took the turn of the buff and I started to feed because what they do humanity is not right I know that it is me but I would like to give you my prizes, I'm sick of it. (I'm not perma banned only 14 days suspension of the account) date is 12.september to 24 september :)

I would like to give me the prizes for the end of season 7 because I tried hard to get into the gold, but unfortunately in one game my character took the turn of the buff and I started to feed because what they do humanity is not right I know that it is me but I would like to give you my prizes, I'm sick of it. (I'm not perma banned only 14 days suspension of the account)
Probably not banned but suspended because you might have gotten hacked and Riot suspended it for security reasons.
